text: The Water Lily is a 1919 silent film drama directed by George Ridgwell and starring Alice Mann.The AFI Catalog of Feature Films:..The Water Lily The Water Lily at silentera.com Prints survive in the Library of Congress collection and the BFI National Archive.Catalog of Holdings The American Film Institute Collection and The United Artists Collection at The Library of Congress (<-book title) p.204 c.1978 the American Film Institute The Library of Congress/FIAF American Silent Feature Film Survival Catalog:..The Water Lily ==Cast== *Alice Mann - Genevieve Conners *Emil De Varney - Jim Conners *Philip Yale Drew - Dick Carlisle *Francis Mann - Evelyn Carlisle *Donald Hall - Willard Carlisle *Eloise Hampton - Mrs. Lawson *Charles A. Robins - Biff Dunton *Edgar Wedd - Dwight Lawson *Leatrice Joy - ? ==References== ==External links== * The Water Lily at IMDb.com Category:1919 films Category:American silent feature films Category:American films Category:Triangle Film Corporation films Category:Films directed by George Ridgwell Category:American black-and-white films Category:American drama films Category:1919 drama films Category:Films with screenplays by Lillian Case Russell
title: The Water Lily (1919 film)
